solution_line_template: Megan was the lead actress in {total_plays} * {lead_actress_percentage_num}% = <<{total_plays}*{lead_actress_percentage_num}*{percent_factor}={lead_actress_plays}>>{lead_actress_plays} plays.
So Megan was not the lead actress in {total_plays} - {lead_actress_plays} = <<{total_plays}-{lead_actress_plays}={not_lead_actress_plays}>>{not_lead_actress_plays} plays.
